sentence: A pro-Herschel Walker outside group, 34N22, launched a statewide billboard campaign on Tuesday tying U.S. Sen. Raphael Warnock to President Joe Bidens policies and Atlantas crime rate.
author: Tia Mitchell
title: The Jolt: Voting rights heads to Senate floor for likely defeat

sentence: Walker campaign manager Scott Paradise touted that "this massive fundraising haul, likely the largest in the country for a non-incumbent, shows that Georgia Republicans are clearly united behind Herschel Walker and are ready to take on Senator Warnock."
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Trump-backed Herschel Walker reports hauling in nearly $10M since launching GOP Senate bid in Georgia

sentence: He has outraised his GOP opponent, Herschel Walker, by almost double in the last quarter of 2021, with donations averaging at $43.
author: Rebekah Sager
title: Warnock soaring to the lead in fundraising over GOP opponent, Trump lapdog Herschel Walker

sentence: Georgia voters are on edge about rising inflation rates and economic struggles, according to an Atlanta Journal-Constitution poll that also shows Warnock in a tight race against Republican football standout Herschel Walker in a hypothetical matchup.
author: Greg Bluestein
title: Warnock to Georgians in debut 2022 ad: I see you, I hear you, I am you.
